name: BenQ ScreenBar Plus
image_prompt: BenQ ScreenBar Plus monitor light, black aluminum bar mounted on monitor, desktop dial controller
description: Asymmetric monitor light bar with desktop dial controller. Features auto-dimming, adjustable color temperature 2700K-6500K, and zero screen glare design for eye comfort.

reviews.review_text: No more eye strain during late night coding sessions.
Desktop controller is so convenient. Auto-dim works great.
Great light but wish it was a bit brighter.
